name: initialize_vault
body: let v = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
v . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
v . bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("vault") . unwrap () ;

name: withdraw_with_custom_bump
body: let seeds = & [b"vault" . as_ref () , vault . owner . as_ref () , core :: slice :: from_ref (& user_bump) ,] ;
let derived = Pubkey :: create_program_address (& [b"vault" , vault . owner . as_ref () , & [user_bump]] , ctx . program_id ,) . map_err (| _ | error ! (VaultError :: InvalidSeeds)) ? ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& derived , & ctx . accounts . recipient . key () , lamports ,) ;

invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . vault_account . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 1 , seeds = [b"vault" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"vault" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = vault . bump)]

fields.name: vault_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 検証されないアカウント"]
